title: Awesome Spyglass!
description: Displays detailed info about dinos, players, structures and more right in view. Many options configurable via INI or in-game.

title: Super Structures
description: Fork of Structures Plus from 2019. Large building system with many quality of life features and extra parts.

title: Dino Storage v2
description: Stores tamed dinos as items, reduces server load and is fully configurable. Respects tame limits.

title: Death Recovery Mod
description: Personal gravestone to recover lost items after death. Craft and place in your base.

title: Awesome Teleporters!
description: Adds networked teleporters with a simple UI. Supports public hubs and configurable ranges.

title: Upgrade Station v1.8i
description: Upgrade weapons, armor, tools and saddles up to Ascendant. Works with many modded items.

title: Kraken's Better Dinos
description: Improves the utility and behavior of many vanilla dinos plus many quality of life tweaks.

title: Castles, Keeps, and Forts Remastered
description: Reworked building set with medieval pieces. Uses vanilla shapes for better compatibility.

title: Ultra Stacks
description: Higher stack sizes with reduced weight. Extends spoil timers too.

title: Simple Spawners
description: Spawn creatures, resources, loot crates or nests at chosen spots. Build your own biomes.

title: Shiny! Dinos
description: Rare special dinos with unique colors, abilities or higher levels spawn in the world.

title: Dino Tracker
description: Find lost dinos quickly. Works as a glove skin and shows the location on demand.

title: Auto Engrams!
description: Automatically unlocks engrams when leveling. Respects overrides and can include TEK.

title: Platforms Plus (Open Source)
description: More options for tree and cliff platforms including snap points, ramps and wedges.

title: eco's RP Decor
description: Decorative furniture and many items for RP servers. Fully stackable and can be picked up.

title: Platforms Plus LTS
description: Long term support variant of Platforms Plus with fixes for Homestead changes.

title: GG Stacks 10000-90
description: Raises stack sizes a lot and reduces weight. Successor to some older HG stacks.

title: TG Stacking Mod 10000-90
description: Stacks up to 10,000 and reduces weight by 90 percent. Read usage notes.

title: Structures Plus (S+)
